item.title: DNS use both the protocols TCP and UDP
item.description: UDP packets can’t be greater than 512 bytes. TCP is used for Zone transfer and UDP for name, and queries either regular (primary) or reverse. There should be consistency in DNS Zone database.

item.title: DevOps!
item.description: what is devops DevOps 是一种工作模式，集合文化理念、实践和工具，来使团队的工作合作更高效，交付更便捷可靠。 why need devops 懒 因为它可以帮我们自动的处理一些苦燥的任务

item.title: Game Theory
